welcomeBackRoyalAchievements: I'm so happy to see you again, you mighty __ACHIEVEMENTS__.
welcomeBackRoyalLast: New adventures are waiting for you.
welcomeBackCheckpoint: Alexa: Would you like to continue with __MISSION_NAME__ or choose a new mission?
newMissionUnlocked: Alexa: Hey, you've unlocked a new mission, called __MISSION_NAME__! I bet it's lots of fun! If you want to go on the new mission, say YES. Or if you want to choose a different mission, say NO.
selectMission: The following missions are unlocked: __MISSIONS_AVAILABLE__. Which one would you like to do?
sceneFailReprompt: Do you want to try again?
demoPrompt: Would you like Lily to show you how it's done?
royalRansomAncientTemple1Outro0: Ben: Cool, we've got 40 coins! Just one more hallway and we're out of the tem-- Ben: Oh no! The entire floor is collapsing! It's going to take a super leap to reach the end. Let's do it by shouting 'woohoo!' Ready…. Now!
royalRansomAncientTemple1Outro1No: Ben: Oops! You didn't make it and got hurt! Luckily, I pulled you up though. Lily: Let's hurry! Sir Bedivere needs us!
royalRansomAncientTemple1Outro1Yes: Ben: Awesome! That was the farthest jump I've ever seen! Lily: Let's hurry! Sir Bedivere needs us!
royalRansomAncientTemple2Outro0: Ben: 60 coins already? We rock! Next stop, Pirate Bay! Ben: Uh oh! It looks like someone, or something, sealed the gate shut already! Try breaking through with a mighty punch by shouting 'Hiyaaa!' Ready…. Now!
royalRansomAncientTemple2Outro1No: Ben: Ouch, you didn't do it right and hurt your fist! Good thing I broke the gate though! Lily: King Max will be back in his castle in no time thanks to us!
royalRansomAncientTemple2Outro1Yes: Ben: Holy moly! You showed that gate door who's boss! Lily: King Max will be back in his castle in no time thanks to us!
pirateBusinessAncientTemple1Outro0: Ben: Just one more hallway to go and-- Ben: Oh no! The entire thing is covered in floor spikes! It's going to take a super leap to reach the end. Let's do it by shouting 'woohoo!' Ready…. Now!
pirateBusinessAncientTemple1Outro1No: Ben: Oops! You didn't make it and got hurt! I'm glad we still got out though. Lily: We just need 40 coins to get Captain Seadog's crew! Onward to Pirate Bay!
pirateBusinessAncientTemple1Outro1Yes: Ben: Cool! That was a crazy long jump! You should join the Olympics or something. Lily: We just need 40 coins to get Captain Seadog's crew! Onward to Pirate Bay!
pirateBusinessAncientTemple2Outro0: Ben: Hey, we're almost out of here and on to Pirate Bay! Ben: Uh oh! It looks like someone, or something, sealed the gate shut already! Try breaking through with a mighty punch by shouting 'Hiyaaa!' Ready…. Now!
pirateBusinessAncientTemple2Outro1No: Ben: Ouch, you didn't do it right and hurt your fist! Good thing I broke the gate though! Lily: Captain Seadog will have his beloved Galleon repaired soon! Just 60 more coins!
pirateBusinessAncientTemple2Outro1Yes: Ben: Holy moly! You showed that gate door who's boss! Lily: Captain Seadog will have his beloved Galleon repaired soon! Just 60 more coins!
royalRansomPirateBay1Outro0: Ben: Cap'n, we're nearing King Max's kingdom. Wait, the Pirate Queen's ship is fast approaching! [loud sound of pirates] Ben: Her nasty pirate gang is preparing to board our ship! Signal your crew to fight by shouting 'avast ye scallywags!' Ready... go!
royalRansomPirateBay1Outro1No: Ben: Yikes, the Pirate Queen's gang got us good but we still kicked them off the ship. Lily: Nothing can stop us from helping to save Sir Bedivere! Just 40 more coins!
royalRansomPirateBay1Outro1Yes: Ben: Arr! You inspired your crew to show those pirate scoundrels a lesson! Lily: Nothing can stop us from helping to save Sir Bedivere! Just 40 more coins!
royalRansomPirateBay2Outro0: Ben: Woah, did you feel that? Something has grabbed our ship! [loud sound of sea monster] Ben: It's the Kraken! Quick, shoot all our cannons at once by saying 'kaboom' when I say go. Ready... go!
royalRansomPirateBay2Outro1No: Ben: Oh no, we didn't shoot the Kraken's tentacles off so it damaged our ship. We somehow still got away though. Lily: We'll be docking in King Max's kingdom soon! Just 60 more coins!
royalRansomPirateBay2Outro1Yes: Ben: Nice one, cap'n! We blew the Kraken's tentacles clean off the ship! Lily: We'll be docking in King Max's kingdom soon! Just 60 more coins!
tikiTroublePirateBay1Outro0: Ben: Cap'n, we're nearing fantasy kingdom, and with the 40 coins we came wanted to find here. Hold on.... [loud sound of pirates] Ben: Yikes! Some of your crew is trying to start a munity to take our coins for themselves! Shout 'avast ye scallywags!' to tell your good men to fight. Ready... go!
tikiTroublePirateBay1Outro1No: Ben: Oops, your men took a beating but we still ended the mutiny. Lily: We still need more coins for Tiki Barry's Drum! We can do it!
tikiTroublePirateBay1Outro1Yes: Ben: Arr! You inspired your crew to show those betraying scoundrels a lesson! Lily: We still need more coins for Tiki Barry's Drum! We can do it!
tikiTroublePirateBay2Outro0: Ben: Awesome, we've got 60 coins already! Woah, did you feel that? Something is grabbing our ship! [loud sound of sea monster] Ben: It's the Kraken! Quick, shoot all our cannons at once by saying 'kaboom' when I say go. Ready... go!
tikiTroublePirateBay2Outro1No: Ben: Whew! The Kraken got ahold of the ship but we managed to slip away! Lily: We need more coins for Tiki Mezzo's ukulele! Let's find some in Fantasy Kingdom!
tikiTroublePirateBay2Outro1Yes: Ben: Nice one, cap'n! We blew the Kraken's tentacles clean off the ship! Lily: We need more coins for Tiki Mezzo's ukulele! Let's find some in Fantasy Kingdom!
kingdomChase1Intro0: Ben: We made it to King Max's kingdom! Magic exists here, ya know! What's that phrase you always say, Lily? Lily: Abracadabra! Ben: Hey friend, do you know any other magic words?
kingdomChase1Intro1: Ben: Nice! Maybe we can-- [sound of thief taking treasure and laughing] Lily: Hey! That thief took our stuff! After him!
kingdomChase2Intro0: Ben: This is fantasy kingdom! It has a village, a castle, and even mythical creatures! Lily: What do you mean by mythical, brother? Ben: It means they appear in old stories and fables! Do you see any mythical creatures here in Fantasy Kingdom, explorer?
kingdomChase2Intro1: Lily: I think I see it too! I hope I find a unicorn! Ben: Maybe we'll-- [sound of thief taking coins and laughing] Ben: Hey! Stop, you thief! Those are our coins! Lily: Let's get him!
pirateBusinessKingdomChaseOutro1Yes: Ben: That looked like it hurt! The thief will be seeing stars for a while after that! Lily: I'm so glad we already have 20 coins for Captain Seadog's hat! Let's find more at the temple!
pirateBusinessKingdomChase1Outro0: Ben: The thief's trying to get away by riding a wild horse! Ben: Maybe we can scare it so it kicks the thief off. Let's shout 'rawr' in three, two one... now!
pirateBusinessKingdomChase1Outro1No: Ben: Darn, the thief got away! At least we collected a lot of coins from him though. Lily: We're off to a good start with the coins we need for Captain Seadog's crew. We already have 40! Let's find more at the temple!
pirateBusinessKingdomChase1Outro1Yes: Ben: It worked! Ouch, that wasn't a pretty landing. More coins for us! Lily: We're off to a good start with the coins we need for Captain Seadog's crew. We already have 40! Let's find more at the temple!
pirateBusinessKingdomChase2Outro0: Ben: The thief has gone crazy! He's hiding inside a sleeping dragon's mouth! Ben: I've got an idea! Let's wake up the dragon with a loud 'Boo!' Ready... now!
pirateBusinessKingdomChase2Outro1No: Ben: Oh well. Maybe the dragon will spit him out sooner or later. Lily: Luckily we got 60 coins from the thief for Captain Seadog's ship! Let's collect more at the ancient temple!
pirateBusinessKingdomChase2Outro1Yes: Ben: It worked! The dragon spit him right out. Eww, that's a lot of spit... Lily: Luckily we got 60 coins from the thief for Captain Seadog's ship! Let's collect more at the ancient temple!
tikiTroubleKingdomChase1Outro0: Ben: Woah, look at the size of that beehive the thief just pulled out! Ben: He's gonna throw it at us! Let's bat it back his way with a stick by shouting 'thwack!' Ready... now!
tikiTroubleKingdomChase1Outro1No: Ben: Ouch! Those bee stings didn't feel good, but we'll live. Lily: We're off to a good start with the coins we need for Captain Seadog's crew. Let's find the last 40 coins we need at the temple!
tikiTroubleKingdomChase1Outro1Yes: Ben: Hah! Look at him run while getting stung by all those bees! Serves him right! Lily: We're off to a good start with the coins we need for Captain Seadog's crew. Let's find the last 40 coins we need at the temple!
tikiTroubleKingdomChase2Outro0: Ben: The thief has gone crazy! He's hiding inside a sleeping dragon's mouth! Ben: I've got an idea! Let's wake up the dragon with a loud 'Boo!' Ready... now!
tikiTroubleKingdomChase2Outro1No: Ben: Oh well. Maybe the dragon will spit him out sooner or later. Lily: Let's head over to ancient temple and get the last 60 coins we need for Tiki Mezzo's ukulele!
tikiTroubleKingdomChase2Outro1Yes: Ben: It worked! The dragon spit him right out. Eww, that's a lot of spit... Lily: Let's head over to ancient temple and get the last 60 coins we need for Tiki Mezzo's ukulele!
pirateBusiness1Intro0: Ben: Great job last time, crew! Captain Seadog looks very happy with his new hat! And hey, we got an awesome Pirate Flag as a reward! Lily: That hat was pretty valuable! I hope he doesn't bury it or something... Ben: Hey, SEA VOYAGER. Where would you bury your pirate treasure?
pirateBusiness1Intro1: Lily: Good idea! Don't forget to make a map so you remember how to find it later! Ben: This time our goal is to gather enough coins to help Captain Seadog hire back his old crew. They're more expensive than a pirate hat, so this time we'll need 120 COINS. Lily: Arr, it'll be like a pirate family reunion! Ben: We only need 10 COINS from each area. Let's go!
pirateBusiness2Intro0: Ben: Good job during our last pirate mission, mateys! We got Captain Seadog's beloved crew back and got a cool Pirate Parrot as a reward! Parrot: Caw! Ben: However, Seadog and his men can't journey out to sea without a ship. Lily: Hey, SHIPMASTER. Where in the world would you sail with your own ship?
pirateBusiness2Intro1: Ben: Cool! I'd try to find undiscovered islands! Lily: What happened to his old ship? Is it gone? Ben: It's not gone, sis, but badly damaged. If fact, we'll need a whopping 180 COINS to repair his precious ship. But we can do it! All we need is to get 15 COINS in each area. Follow me!
pirateBusiness1Outro0: Ben: That adventure had plenty of thrills! And hey, we have enough coins to rehire Captain Seadog's crew! Let's go! Captain Seadog: Ahoy, SEA VOYAGER and mateys! How are ye? Ben: Ahoy, captain! Captain Seadog: What do you buccaneers think o' my new pirate hat? Lily: I like the big feather! Ben: Hey SEA VOYAGER, if you could have any hat, what would it look like?
pirateBusiness1Outro1: Ben: Captain, we've collected enough coins to rehire your old crew! Captain Seadog: Arrr, it'll be nice having me old crew scrubbing' the poop deck again! For ye efforts, I bestow upon thee the nickname SHIPMASTER. Ye can also have my trusty PIRATE PARROT! Lily: What a cutie! Ben: Awesome! Well, off to our next adventure! Come on, guys! You coming, SHIPMASTER?
pirateBusiness2Outro0: Ben: That was our most epic adventure yet! Let's get these coins to Captain Seadog! Captain Seadog: Ahoy, SHIPMASTER and mateys! What news do ya bring? Lily: Captain! We have enough coins to repair your trusty ship! Captain Seadog: Shiver me timbers! That's wonderful! Those evil pirates better start sayin' their prayers! Captain Seadog: For your help, I'm letting you rename my ship! Ben: Got any good ideas, SHIPMASTER?
pirateBusiness2Outro1: Captain Seadog: I like the sound o' that! For yer help I'm givin' ye the best nickname I can think of: GRAND ADMIRAL. Ye also get me precious PIRATE TREASURE CHEST! Lily: Look at all that shiny treasure! Captain Seadog: So long, me hearties! May ye always have fair winds! Ben: So long, captain! Well GRAND ADMIRAL, off to our next adventure!
tikiTrouble1Intro0: Ben: Tiki Ten is happy to have his bamboo xylophone back! That Tiki Torch he gave us is pretty neat too! Now let's help buy Tiki Barry's beloved drum. Lily: What makes this particular drum so special? Ben: Because it was given to him long ago by his precious tiki mom, duh! Lily: Aww, that's sweet. Ben: Hey, TIKI PIONEER. Do you have something special that your mom or dad gave you?
tikiTrouble1Intro1: Lily: That's neat! I have a heart necklace from mom and dad. I never leave home without it! Ben: The museum raised their prices, so we'll need 120 COINS to get the jungle drum back. Not at problem if we get 10 COINS in each area. Let's go!
tikiTrouble2Intro0: Ben: Good job last time, guys! Tiki Ten and Tiki Barry have their instruments back. We even got an awesome Tiki Mask as a reward! Now we need Tiki Mezzo's ukulele. Lily: No problem! I'm sure it'll cost the same as the other instruments, right? Ben: Not exactly. The treasure hunter accidentally broke this one, which means it's going to cost more to buy and repair. Lily: Hey, TIKI PATHFINDER, Have you ever broken something you really liked?
tikiTrouble2Intro1: Lily: Aww. I tore my favorite skirt the other day. I loved it! Ben: Since it's the last instrument, the museum raised their price even more! We'll need 180 COINS to buy the ukulele! That means we need to get 15 COINS in each area. We can do it! Follow me!
tikiTrouble1Outro0: Ben: What an exciting adventure! Hey, we've got enough coins for Tiki Barry's Drum! I already sent the coins to buy it. Let's go find him behind the temple. [footsteps] Ben: Hey Tiki Barry! Tiki Barry: Tiki Barry no want to talk now. Not even to TIKI PIONEER. Tiki Barry sad he doesn't have drum... Lily: Poor thing. I'd be sad too. Ben: Have you ever lost something you really liked, TIKI PIONEER?
tikiTrouble1Outro1: Ben: Don't worry, Tiki barry! We bought back your drum! It should arrive any minute... Delivery man: Delivery for Tiki Barry! Tiki Barry: Wow, Tiki Barry has his big drum back! Listen to this. [play a short drum tune] Tiki Barry: For your help, me call you TIKI PATHFINDER. I also give you TIKI MASK. Please help my other tiki brother too! Lily: That's a fun looking tiki mask! Ben: The nickname is great too! Off to our next adventure, TIKI PATHFINDER!
tikiTrouble2Outro0: Ben: What a thrilling adventure! Hey, we've got enough coins for Tiki Mezzo's ukulele! I already sent the coins to buy it. Let's go find him. [footsteps] Ben: Hey Tiki Mezzo! Tiki Mezzo: Tiki Mezzo no feel like talking. Not even to TIKI PATHFINDER. Tiki Mezzo sad he doesn't have ukulele... Lily: Aww, I feel bad for him! Ben: Hey, TIKI PATHFINDER. What do you do to cheer yourself up?
tikiTrouble2Outro1: Ben: Don't worry, Tiki Mezzo! We used our coins to buy your ukulele back! I think-- Delivery man: Delivery for Tiki Mezzo! Tiki Mezzo: Good timing! Tiki Mezzo has ukulele back. Listen to this: [play a short ukulele tune] Tiki Mezzo: New nickname for helping me and tiki brothers.  Now we call you SUPER TIKI WARRIOR. Also give you great tiki weapon, TIKI SPEAR. Lily: That spear looks so cool! Ben: I know! So long tikis! Me and SUPER TIKI WARRIOR are off to another adventure! Tiki Mezzo: Bu-Bye!
rootHelp: Alexa: There are three epic missions: aid King Max in rescuing the royal family, lend an old pirate seadog a hand, or help a musical trio of magic Tikis. In each mission you'll face exciting obstacles, find coins to collect, and earn unique rewards!
actionHelp: Seems like you'd like some help.  Should I remind you how to handle the new obstacle?
royalRansomHelp: You have __TOTAL_COINS__ coins. To help the king MAX save his daughter Anna, a beautiful princess, you need to collect 60 coins.
royalRansom1Help: You've got __TOTAL_COINS__ coins.To save Sir Bedevire, the royal family pet, you need to collect 120 coins.
royalRansom2Help: You have __TOTAL_COINS__ coins. To rescue the great King Max himself, you need to collect 180 coins.
pirateBusinessHelp: You have __TOTAL_COINS__ coins. To inspire Captain Seadog with a new pirate hat, you'll need to collect 60 coins.
pirateBusiness1Help: You've got __TOTAL_COINS__ coins. To round up Captain Seadog's old crew again, you'll need to collect 120 coins.
pirateBusiness2Help: You have __TOTAL_COINS__ coins. In order to repair Captain Seadog's beloved ship, you'll need to collect 180 coins.
tikiTroubleHelp: You have __TOTAL_COINS__ coins. To buy back Tiki Ten's cool bamboo xylophone from the museum, you need to collect 60 coins.
tikiTrouble1Help: You have __TOTAL_COINS__ coins. To buy back Tiki Barry's awesome drum from the museum, you need to collect 120 coins.
tikiTrouble2Help: You have __TOTAL_COINS__ coins. To buy back Tiki Mezzo's amazing ukulele from the museum, you need to collect 180 coins.
quitHelpContinue: Do you want to continue playing?
templeHallsHelp: For SNAKES say Alexa Speechcon: whee! to jump over. For COINS say Alexa Speechcon: kaching! to grab them For BLOW DARTS say Alexa Speechcon: yikes! to duck under.
templeHalls1Help: For SNAKE, FLOOR SPIKES say Alexa Speechcon: whee! to jump over to leep over. For COINS say Alexa Speechcon: kaching' to grab them. For BLOW DARTS, ARROWS, SWING AXE  say Alexa Speechcon: yikes! to duck under.
templeHalls2Help: For SNAKE, FLOOR SPIKES, COLLAPSING FLOOR, RATS say Alexa Speechcon: whee! to jump over. For COINS say Alexa Speechcon: kaching! For BLOW DARTS, ARROWS, SWING AXE  say Alexa Speechcon: yikes! to duck under. For JAGUAR say  Alexa Speechcon: yum! to toss a steak!

For BLOW DARTS, ARROWS, SWING AXE or POISON GAS  say Alexa Speechcon: yikes! to duck under. For JAGUAR, CROCODILE say Alexa Speechcon: yum! to toss a steak!
outToSeaHelp: For COINS say Alexa Speechcon: kaching! to grab them. For ROCKS say Alexa Speechcon: wowzer! to turn the ship. For SAILORS say Alexa Speechcon: ahoy! to give a friendly greeting.
outToSea1Help: For COINS say Alexa Speechcon: kaching! to grab them. For ROCKS say Alexa Speechcon: wowzer! to turn the ship. For SAILORS, MERMAIDS say Alexa Speechcon: ahoy! to give a friendly greeting. For PIRATES say Alexa Speechcon: whammo! to shoot the cannons. For BIG WAVES say Alexa Speechcon: whee! to speed up.

For PIRATES, PIRATE QUEEN say Alexa Speechcon: whammo! For BIG WAVES say Alexa Speechcon: whee! to speed up. For SEA SNAKE say Alexa Speechcon: kerpow! to shoot the giant harpoon!

learnMore: Need more help with this mission?
stop: See you back here soon. Thanks for playing!
newMissionPrompt: Do you want to start a new mission?
quitPrompt: If you quit the mission now, you’ll have to start again later at the last checkpoint. Sure you want to bail?
resetPrompt: If you reset the mission, you’ll lose all your mission progress. You can always start this mission from the beginning later. Are you sure you want to reset your mission progress?
resetReprompt: Are you sure you want to reset your mission progress?
restartPrompt: Do you want to reset your progress in this mission and start it from the beginning?
finished: You have already completed this mission. Finish all 3 missions to complete the game.
allFinished: Congratulations! You have completed all adventures for now! New missions are coming soon! Meanwhile, you can reset your progress and play any of the completed missions again.
welcomeReprompt: Would you like to join Ben?
